2022.title: T2T-CHM13
2022.description: Telomere-to-Telomere Consortium delivers a complete human genome, filling in the missing pieces and correcting the errors present in the previous reference genomes.

2022.title: ESMFold
2022.description: Meta AI publishes Evolutionary Scale Modeling ESMFold â€“ a model that predicts protein structure from amino acid sequences.

2022.title: JCVI-syn3A computer-simulation
2022.description: Scientists develop a computer model of the minimized synthetic cell, JCVI-syn3A, that accurately predicts the growth and molecular structure of its real-life analog.

2022.title: CROPSR
2022.description: The first open-source software tool for genome-wide design and evaluation of gRNA sequences for CRISPR experiments.

2022.title: AnVIL
2022.description: Johns Hopkins University creates a cloud-based platform known as AnVIL (Genomic Data Science Analysis, Visualization, and Informatics Lab-space), that gives any researcher with an Internet connection access to thousands of analysis tools, patient records, and more than 300,000 genomes.

2022.title: REFLECT
2022.description: The University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Centre develops REcurrent Features LEveraged for Combination Therapy (REFLECT), which integrates machine learning and cancer informatics algorithms.
